talk.author: did:plc:xpcjx7spp6m2gy6ydgms7b5r
talk.utter: I'm thinking the dipshit is going to flame out in the next year. I don't think he is operating in reality, and he's not looking very healthy.

talk.author: did:plc:3xrd2qv26ipwqyn2ym22roaz
talk.utter: Is there anything in the history of this country that you can point to where this scenario played out? I speak from ignorance, so I am truly hoping there is one because it would give me endless joy to watch this cretin flame out. His smarmy tone and cringe takes are like sandpaper to my brain.

talk.author: did:plc:xpcjx7spp6m2gy6ydgms7b5r
talk.utter: There have been numerous well-known and well-heeled people who destroyed themselves with chemicals.  Power, money, and access to anything they want tends to rot people. Once they become addicted to a substance, it can get really ugly.

talk.author: did:plc:xpcjx7spp6m2gy6ydgms7b5r
talk.utter: There have been numerous well-known and well-heeled people who destroyed themselves with chemicals.  Power, money, and access to anything they want tends to rot people. Once they become addicted to a substance, it can get really ugly.

talk.author: did:plc:3xrd2qv26ipwqyn2ym22roaz
talk.utter: Even My Pillow Guy will make out OK though, you know? Looked kind of sketchy for a while, but he's gonna be just fine with that "Office of Election Integrity" appointment.

talk.author: did:plc:xpcjx7spp6m2gy6ydgms7b5r
talk.utter: Yeah, he might be ok for a while. Ultimately,  he will probably regret being involved. All these guys are flying high, and they aren't even in office. We will see how much fun they're having in 4 years. If we're all still here.

talk.author: did:plc:xpcjx7spp6m2gy6ydgms7b5r

talk.author: did:plc:3xrd2qv26ipwqyn2ym22roaz
talk.utter: I'd put good money on Elon splitting with Trump before Jan 20th. But I think it's going to be a long time before he falls anywhere down the "richest" list unless the split is really bad and Leon loses his SpaceX & carbon credit welfare pipelines.

talk.author: did:plc:xpcjx7spp6m2gy6ydgms7b5r
talk.utter: Oh, I'm not expecting Musk to lose his fortune any time soon. But I could easily see him having serious health issues and getting sidelined. He's been getting a lot of media attention, & Trump likes to be the center. Case in point- today's CA & MEX tariff tweet. It's going to be the stupidest Circus

He's been getting a lot of media attention, & Trump likes to be the center. Case in point- today's CA & MEX tariff tweet. It's going to be the stupidest Circus

talk.author: did:plc:3xrd2qv26ipwqyn2ym22roaz
talk.utter: Yeah - getting into a trade war with our two biggest trading partners. What could possibly go wrong? Vehicle parts, wood products, petroleum products, industrial machinery and parts - it's going to affect EVERYTHING. 42% of our timber comes from Canada. Remember plywood costs during COVID? Idiots!

talk.author: did:plc:xpcjx7spp6m2gy6ydgms7b5r
talk.utter: And we don't even know whether it will happen.  He lies about everything. One thing is true, though. We're all talking about it, which is exactly what he wanted.
